### Loading libraries
```{r message=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)
```

```{r}
read_wind_data <- function(gtm.rawData, save_flag=TRUE){
  #Reads the wind turbine data CSV, cleans and prints it out.
  #gtm.rawData <- read.csv(file=input, header = TRUE, sep=",")
  gtm.dat <- within(gtm.rawData, rm("X.GV.SD_04","X.GV.SD_05","X.GV.SD_38", "X.GV.HRR_GeneratorWindingTemp.1"))
  c_names <- colnames(gtm.dat, do.NULL = TRUE, prefix = "col")
  raw_data <- str_replace(c_names, "X.GV.", "")
  names(gtm.dat) <- raw_data
  
  
  write.csv(gtm.dat, file = "clean_wind_data.csv")
  return(gtm.dat)
}
```

```{r}
input_csv <- read.csv(file="wind_data.csv", header=TRUE, sep=",")
#csv_name <- "wind_data.csv"
read_wind_data(input_csv, save_flag=TRUE)
```
